page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...
page.content: I wake up at 7.50. I get out of bed and go downstairs and have breakfast.I have Weetabix. I get dressed, go upstairs and brush my teeth.Then I pack my school bag. At 8.30 my brother and I walk down to catch the school bus. At the bus stop, which is by the Post Office, we meet up with 6 people. In a few minutes our bus comes. On the way to school we travel through 5 villages. Our school is in Buckland Newton. The 5 villages we go through are Pulham, Glanvilles Wooton, Middlemarsh and Holwell. Our school is quite small. There are only 70 children there and only 4 teachers.In the evening on the way home we sit at the back of the bus and talk about different things.
